Text.Page:
I know Tifane is going to keep you busy, but the shurians are out of control!

The ones in Molten Reach are running around, stabbing people in the face!

Who knows why they're here? Who cares, really? Just drive them off, !
We're making significant progress on getting this area cleared of hostiles. Another victory for the federation!
Look, I'm trying to be respectful, but we expect you to pull your weight around here. Go kill some shurians!
